properties.title: DavMail POP/IMAP/SMTP/Caldav/Carddav/LDAP Exchange Gateway - Android DavDroid setup
properties.author: Mickael Guessant

section.name: Android DavDroid setup
section.p: Note: you can't install DavMail directly on an phone, you need a separate DavMail server, see Android setup.

subsection.name: Install DavDroid
subsection.p: The easiest way to sync your Exchange calendar and contacts on Android is to rely on DavDroid. DavDroid is available on Google play store and F-Droid.
DavMail is tested by DavDroid team, see: https://www.davdroid.com/tested-with/davmail-gateway/

subsection.name: Create a new account
subsection.p: Open DavDroid and add a new account. Choose Login with URL and user name.
On next screen, enter a name and choose groups are separate contact.
